mapper.sql: stuId, stuName, stuSex, classId, stuBirth, stuPhone, stuCode, stuAddress, stuContact, stuDesc, stuQQ, stuEmail, stuEntryTime, stuDegree
mapper.select: select * from tb_student inner join tb_clazz on tb_student.classId = tb_clazz.clazzId
mapper.insert: insert into tb_student (stuId, stuName, stuSex, classId, stuBirth, stuPhone, stuCode, stuAddress, stuContact, stuDesc, stuQQ, stuEmail, stuEntryTime, stuDegree) values (#{stuid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{stuname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{stusex,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{classid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{stubirth,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{stuphone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{stucode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{stuaddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{stucontact,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{studesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{stuqq,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{stuemail,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{stuentrytime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{studegree,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

mapper.update:
update tb_student
stuName = #{stuname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
stuSex = #{stusex,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
classId = #{classid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
stuBirth = #{stubirth,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
stuPhone = #{stuphone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
stuCode = #{stucode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
stuAddress = #{stuaddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
stuContact = #{stucontact,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

stuQQ = #{stuqq,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
stuEmail = #{stuemail,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
stuEntryTime = #{stuentrytime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
stuDegree = #{studegree,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where stuId = #{stuid,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update tb_student set stuName = #{stuname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, stuSex = #{stusex,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, classId = #{classid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, stuBirth = #{stubirth,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, stuPhone = #{stuphone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, stuCode = #{stucode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, stuAddress = #{stuaddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, stuContact = #{stucontact,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, stuDesc = #{studesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, stuQQ = #{stuqq,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, stuEmail = #{stuemail,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, stuEntryTime = #{stuentrytime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, stuDegree = #{studegree,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where stuId = #{stuid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
